Reviews.Title: This phone is the way to go!
Reviews.Author: Franky Franks
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this phone! For the price, you simply can't get much better. The phone has a beautiful 4.5" screen that makes surfing the web, playing games, and reading text easy on the eyes. The phone is pretty snappy and is very touch responsive. I've had this phone since it was released from Metro and they released a software upgrade just today; the upgrade is supposed to optimize everything. The phone has a 5mp camera and records 1080p video. The pictures come out great if there is sufficient lighting, but you can always use the flash if there is not. The video quality is also excellent if used outside or where there is enough light. You can also enable the flash to be on all the time while recording movies which is a cool feature. The call quality on this phone is pretty good as Metro has improved so much. I think this phone utilizes a SIM card which you get from Metro, and from what the Metro clerk told me, when you are out of Metro range, the phone will work off of the T-Mobile towers. This phone reminds me a lot of the LG motion, which was my old phone, just a larger version with the bigger screen. Overall, this is a solid mid-range smart phone with an unbeatable price!

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price!
Reviews.Author: K. Song
Reviews.Content: I got this phone from some other place, to use for T-Mobile.It's been few weeks since I bought this, and I really like this phone, so I decided to write some review.Let me start with negative points, since this might be what people interested more.1. This phone lacks a lot of sensors, including light sensor (no auto brightness), gyro, temperature, NFC, etc.2. This has only 4GB internal memory, and only ~1.5GB is available to the user.3. Camera quality is so-so.There are other problems you might notice if you use this.But let's face it.When you are talking about those problems, you are comparing this phone to something a lot more expensive.This one costs only $150. Those phones most people compare this to are ~$600. You can buy 4 L9 for the price of iPhone 5s, Galaxy S4, etc. You know you cannot just expect the same level of spec for the 1/4 of price.This phone is not for someone who plays a lot of 3D games, which requires a lot of space as well as high power.Just like PC, if you want such things, you should buy a lot more expensive, powerful phone.Also, even though the camera quality is so-so, there is no problem taking everyday photos for website uploading, etc.So in my opinion, these problems are very minor, considering the price of the phone and who this phone is targeted.This phone has big (4.5"), bright, and clear screen. LG is known for good IPS screens, and this phone has no less.Resolution might be bit low in today's standard (it has qHD), but you won't really notice it.Also, this phone is pretty fast and responsive. And I think its 1GHz dual core is more than enough to handle most stuff smoothly. At least, I didn't experience any problem.So, as long as you can live with 1.5GB app storage and don't play heavy 3D games, this phone should work just fine for you. In fact, this one's power is about the same level as Galaxy S2.Finally, there are few things to note.1. This phone is the same as T-Mobile's LG L9. This one's model number is MS769 and T-Mobile's is P769. They are exactly the same.2. Unlike T-Mobile version, this version of the phone does NOT have carrier branding. Just LG mark and that's it. (Big plus for me!)3. This phone is SIM LOCKED to Metro PCS. You CANNOT use T-Mobile's SIM card right out of the box. (Service Provider Lock, but does not have network lock)4. This Metro PCS one contains a lot LESS bloatwares compared to T-Mobile's. But there is something called MyExtras, which pops up ads, that should be disabled immediately.5. Usually, this Metro PCS version is cheaper than T-Mobile's version. This one costs only $150 while T-Mobile's is ~$200.6. If this does not already have 4.1.2, you WILL get software update notification, even if you don't put any SIM card in it, as long as you are connected to WIFI. So, this one has 4.1.2 Jellybean.If you want to get L9 for T-Mobile, GET THIS ONE.Then you can unlock this phone using... you-know-where-to-look-for way and it will be a lot cheaper.UPDATE: I forgot to mention... If you use this phone on T-Mobile, WIFI calling does NOT work. It says invalid SIM. (FYI, other things work fine. I get 4G signal no problem)I don't know whether there is some way to enable it, but since I don't use it, I just disabled it. So, if you need this feature, just stay on Metro PCS.UPDATE 2: Someone mentioned that updating E911 address enabled WIFI calling, so I tried and it indeed works!So just go to My T-Mobile, and update E911 address under profile menu.

Reviews.Title: Was A Good MetroPcs Phone - Replaced By $49 LG L70
Reviews.Author: Alan  Houston
Reviews.Content: The LG L9 has now been replaced by the $49 LG L70 with Android Kitkat.  The L9 was a very good phone for MetroPCS using T-Mobile's 4G HSPA+ network which covers 80% of the largest cities across the USA. As of May 2014, the LG L9 has been discontinued.The old 2012 model LG L9 has now been replaced by the new 2014 model LG L70 which has 4G HSPA speeds and the newest version of Android Kit Kat software. MetroPcs stores sell the newer L70 for $49.The L9 and L70 lack 4G LTE, but they use 4G HSPA to stream Pandora Radio and Spotify music smoothly and standard YouTube videos load and play after a short wait.Both the L9 and L70 both have average cameras that take okay photos in bright sun but take mediocre photos indoors. The front "Skype" camera is of very poor quality and is almost useless.BEFORE ORDERING A MetroPCS PHONE: Go to the MetroPCS website and use the coverage map to zoom in on the block where you live. Do NOT buy a MetroPCS phone unless there is excellent coverage on your block. A strong signal is essential to enjoying your new phone.  MetroPcs has limited service in many smaller cities and NO service in most rural communities.

Reviews.Title: great phone at a great price
Reviews.Author: Laurie
Reviews.Content: this phone is worth every dollar.not only is it inexpensive but it's a great quality phone, it's super slim, and light weight , it has a great camera, nice features,but i'd consider buying a SD card with it if you're someone who likes to have alot of apps on their phone.

Reviews.Title: Good phone... but...
Reviews.Author: pint67
Reviews.Content: This is my first smartphone. I bought it at metro PCS a few months ago. It works fine except it has very little internal memory. When I put in a SD card for memory, it presents problems and has trouble recognizing it.You cannot move the apps to the SD card. It seemingly has to do with this version of Android on this particular phone.I have tried the many "apps to SD" apps out there as well as other apps that may be of help and none will help with remedying this problem. Looking online, one can find that this is not that uncommon with this phone. Neither Android nor LG seem to care.So I had to find a work-around and manually move files to the SD card in the file manager. This is tedious but if I don't do this a few times a week, it runs out of space. (I am not interested in "rooting" anything but have come to find out some people do it to their phones)Other than this pretty big flaw, the phone is great. If I had to buy over again though, I would NOT recommend this phone because of this problem... or I would at least warn the buyer to check the internal memory of this phone.For me, because it's my first, I can live with it until there is a patch or newer version of Android released for this model. But it would also me great not to have to do it and with other phones you can buy, this is not a problem.LG should look into this and release something to help its customers.Hope this helps.And if anyone has a remedy, let me know (I have looked on youtube and around the net with no success).

Reviews.Title: I really like this phone
Reviews.Author: paulzpc
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for two months now and I love it , the service however is a bit shoddy to say the least , Metro Merged with T Mobile.. I am not crazy about this , but the phone LG L9 is a T Mobile phone so I am grateful only for that reason, now back to the phone , it has become quirky, it at times is hard to reboot and jumps from screen to screen when trying to shut it down but I think it's the way I use it and not the phone itself,I just got the rooting right to it and that could make it quirky. I use it to play my music which it has performed wonderfully, I use it to watch movies on my break at work , the phone work wonderfully but is limited to the service , but it will play netflix flawlessly , it plays hulu flawlessly , with the Adobe flash player trick, and still after two months loads very quickly . This phone is a great phone for someone who is going to jump into the Android arena for the first time the performance is 5 star , but will spoil someone wanting to go to a cheaper phone.

Reviews.Title: LG Optimus
Reviews.Author: Jenna
Reviews.Content: Love my new phone, its just like my older one but bigger. Definitely worth the buy for a larger phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone for the price!
Reviews.Author: rsan
Reviews.Content: You can't beat this phone for the price. Highly recommend it. The only complaint we have is that the camera does not work too well at night or in low light conditions. Other than that... the phone loads up apps pretty fast, and has a beautiful screen with nice resolution.

Reviews.Title: For the price
Reviews.Author: LMG
Reviews.Content: Teens love it!!! Not bad for the price.  Has lots of neat gadgets, nice big clear screen. Got them for Christmas presents and was a hit =)

Reviews.Title: Great phone excellent price
Reviews.Author: Happy with My gazebo
Reviews.Content: I was expecting less and i got more so i can not complain.I think is one of the best phone aroung.Great features and excellent price

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Tom Mourant
Reviews.Content: I find this phone much easier to use.  The voice command is very accurate and now I can text my daughter by just speaking.  Battery lasts over a day.  Color is great and very crisp.

Reviews.Title: Great Intermediate android phone
Reviews.Author: WES PARFAIT
Reviews.Content: This is a good phone for anyone who wants a fast android phone, but does not download too many apps, and it has decent battery life.

Reviews.Title: Great phone and great price!
Reviews.Author: DOndrue
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone for my husband. He says the phone great. Good features, stays charged, large screen, and light weight.

Reviews.Title: recommended
Reviews.Author: lsm
Reviews.Content: Bought it as a Christmas gift for my bf. He seems to like it and it works great on tmobile network. Only issue I had was the phone wasn't unlocked like the website had stated overall the phone works greats!

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Great phone, best I've owned so far.  The price point is great for what you get, and I did a bit of research before settling on the Optiumus L9.  Glad I did.

Reviews.Title: LGMS769E
Reviews.Author: Goodington
Reviews.Content: I have this phone it is great, but the internal storage is so small & the ability to move apps to the sd card is a major problem but i wish they would allow me to move apps to sd card because this would save my phones internal memory by the way all the apps i had purchased on my old phone were downloadable because i could move my apps to sd card.If they make another software update they should fix the moving apps problem & the camera on this phone .

Reviews.Title: Stolen phone
Reviews.Author: mr Ray
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter up in college. She went to Metro Pcs store and found out the phone was reported as a stolen phone. Now it has to be turned over to the Police.

Reviews.Title: I had to send it back the next day
Reviews.Author: perez
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my wife and had to send it back the next day because it was horrible it took a very long time to charge (all night) and then some and would die very fast  it also has little memory after downloading a few pics it was running low on memory smh on the upside of things though Amazon was very GREATas far as refunding my money and has the best customer service EVER so I had a good ending in that regard

Reviews.Title: Worth Every Penny
Reviews.Author: Kelly Graham
Reviews.Content: Cons: Shipping was really slow. I advise not to use USPS. Front camera can be low quality unless under bright light.Pros: The phone was used but there was no sign of usage. The phone itself is very nice. The back camera has really good quality. Rate 9.99/10

Reviews.Title: Brand New
Reviews.Author: iesha whitaker
Reviews.Content: Great product, excellent in size very good processing speed and comfortable maneuvering with this phone. Purchased it as a gift they loved it..............

Reviews.Title: Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Iva Piutau
Reviews.Content: Very very happy with my phone that I purchase,  worth buying work beautiful  no drop call and its a beautiful looking phone

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Fernandez Anibal "Anfer"
Reviews.Content: This phone is fantastic. It is much faster than most of the same range, intuitive, easy to handle.Its size is just large enough to work in but not too much to interfere. Its display is spectacular and can record in HD quality makes it more attractive.It seems impossible to get such quality for this low price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone and delivery service
Reviews.Author: Peter E. Burch
Reviews.Content: Terrific phone with great screen and connectivity !Excellent phone for the money.I recommend this phone highly, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: screenguru
Reviews.Content: Phone was great, I dont know why but loading data was slow on this phone, even when connected to wifi. The physical push button was annoying.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Damaris Muniz
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Very please and would buy again.I am enjoying my item. Recommending hope to buy again in the future.

Reviews.Title: great, fast phone
Reviews.Author: Christina V.
Reviews.Content: This is wonderful phone for less money! it is very internet ready and fast. It makes great calls and iam very happy with this purchase! Thank you very much!

Reviews.Title: very smartphon.
Reviews.Author: Johnny Matos
Reviews.Content: Very  Good mobile  for very good price!!!! Excelent, good zize screen, good sound and bright color screen. I recommend...I like!!

Reviews.Title: My Daughter's new awesome phone!
Reviews.Author: Glendia Ramey
Reviews.Content: That's what my girl calls this phone. It has a large screen, the battery lasts a long time, win win!

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My tween daughter wanted a new Samsung smart phone, but due to her age and us not wanting to get her under a contract- we chose this phone to put on a pay as you go plan.  This phone really is fantastic.  The camera may not be as good as some of the smarter phones, but this phone really gives you a bang for your buck.  I am impressed by it.  LG makes great phones at a much lower price point.  I may have to get my son one next!

Reviews.Title: Great economy phone that does it all!  Who needs a Galaxy s4 or an Iphone except if you wanna throw away money!
Reviews.Author: Hans E. Schwarzenbach "Enlighten Books"
Reviews.Content: I've had a bunch of other android phones before this and its a marginal step-up from my circa 2012 HTC desire HD but worth it.  This phone has a decent battery life and decent camera, is quite lightweight and thin yet is responsive with a large wide screen.  I didn't need a new phone but being so cheap its worth the improvements.This was my first LG aand I was skeptical at first.  Now, for $100 I'm very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great little phone worth your buck
Reviews.Author: C.C.
Reviews.Content: Great little phone...very attractive and easy to use and configure...best buy for your buck...Would recommend to anyone looking for a new Metro phone....

Reviews.Title: Stolen phone
Reviews.Author: mr Ray
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter up in college. She went to Metro Pcs store and found out the phone was reported as a stolen phone. Now it has to be turned over to the Police.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Monroe
Reviews.Content: i love the phone it is the best phone i have got it works very well i hope i will tell anyone to get this phone

Reviews.Title: phone is ok

Reviews.Content: in your reviews it said this phone is a on unlocked phone and would work on all t moble systems  it does not it is locked in to metro pcs only  and know i find out that this phone is $29.00 at metor pcs  i fell that is strangefor this phone to be more then half the price of your store i like the phone but i was going to use the walmart family plan with this phonethankstonyd1536@gmail.com1 other thing you can ot move apps from phone to your sd card i called lg and the said you can not move apps

Reviews.Title: Good for the money.
Reviews.Author: Raul Ricardo
Reviews.Content: I guess I can not ask for more in that price range. A lot of complicated things on it that not need to be. Complicated path for simple tasks I used to do on my old Blackberry in one simple click. Not so smart, for a called "smart phone".

Reviews.Title: LG PCS
Reviews.Author: pamela
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to Chris, Shannons husband for Christmas.  He may be loosing his job and I wanted to have him enjoy a way to keep in touch with his lovely wife if they were separated.
